quoteLast: , as dawn was breaking, the Fleet altered course to north and formed single line ahead in the order--2nd Battle Squadron, 4th Battle Squadron, 1st Battle Squadron (less the 6th Division). The 5th Battle Squadron rejoined at 3.30 A.M. and took station ahead of the 2nd Battle Squadron.
title: The Grand Fleet, 1914-1916
author: Jellicoe, John Rushworth, 1859-1935

quoteLast: , August 3d, the simplest inaugural in American history was enacted. In the dim lamplight, with scarce half a dozen witnesses, Calvin Coolidge was sworn in as President by his father, a notary public, taking the oath on the old, well-worn family Bible.
title: White House gossip
author: Colman, Edna M. (Edna Mary), -1951

quoteLast: , but he was ready to start. Indeed, he felt that motion and distraction would be very welcome, for there had stolen into his brain a strangely upsetting idea. It was very likely quite baseless and ill-founded, but it did occur to him that this defect on the part of Mrs.
title: Mrs. Ames
author: Benson, E. F. (Edward Frederic), 1867-1940

title: A True Account of the Battle of Jutland, May 31, 1916
author: Frothingham, Thomas Goddard, 1865-1945
